thread.title: Terrific experience at Eventi!
thread.title_full: Terrific experience at Eventi! - Review of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: reddytogoDallas_TX
title: Terrific experience at Eventi!
text:
We stayed at the Eventi for the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show. What a beautiful property! The location was great--three blocks from Madison Square Garden. The hotel staff was very friendly and professional. The rooms were beautiful with great amenities. We loved the wine happy hour. This was my first time at a Kimpton hotel and I was very impressed. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Room Tip: City view option puts you on the upper floors. See more room tips
